QuestData.Title: A Paladin's Service
QuestData.Description:
I found something strange while using Lindie's Scout-o-Matic that you should probably know about.
The ghost of a paladin appeared on the hill nearby. She looked straight at the Scout-o-Matic and asked for you.
I don't understand a whole lot about paladins and the Light, but I think you may not want to ignore her.
